mapper.sql: id, item_code, item_name, min_value, max_value, unit, reference, order_by, fk_dict_code, value_type, is_top, date_type, personal_min_value, personal_max_value, flage, fk_tenant_id, create_time, create_user_id, update_user_id, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into assay_hosp_dict (id, item_code, item_name, min_value, max_value, unit, reference, order_by, fk_dict_code, value_type, is_top, date_type, personal_min_value, personal_max_value, flage, fk_tenant_id, create_time, create_user_id, update_user_id, update_time, method ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fkDictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valueType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isTop,jdbcType=BIT}, #{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalMinValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{personalMaxValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flage,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{method,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update assay_hosp_dict
item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
min_value = #{minValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
max_value = #{maxValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reference = #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_by = #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fk_dict_code = #{fkDictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
value_type = #{valueType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_top = #{isTop,jdbcType=BIT},
date_type = #{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
personal_min_value = #{personalMinValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
personal_max_value = #{personalMaxValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
flage = #{flage,jdbcType=BIT},
fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
method = #{method,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update assay_hosp_dict set item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, min_value = #{minValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, max_value = #{maxValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reference = #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_by = #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fk_dict_code = #{fkDictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value_type = #{valueType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_top = #{isTop,jdbcType=BIT}, date_type = #{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, personal_min_value = #{personalMinValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, personal_max_value = #{personalMaxValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, flage = #{flage,jdbcType=BIT}, fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, method = #{method,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update assay_hosp_dict set item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, min_value = #{minValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, max_value = #{maxValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reference = #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_by = #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fk_dict_code = #{fkDictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value_type = #{valueType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_top = #{isTop,jdbcType=BIT}, date_type = #{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, personal_min_value = #{personalMinValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, personal_max_value = #{personalMaxValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, flage = #{flage,jdbcType=BIT}, fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: ahd.id, ahd.item_code, ahd.item_name, ahd.min_value, ahd.max_value, ahd.unit, ahd.reference, ahd.method, ahd.order_by, ahd.fk_dict_code, ahd.value_type, ahd.is_top, ahd.date_type, ahd.personal_min_value, ahd.personal_max_value, ahd.flage, ahd.fk_tenant_id, ahdg.group_id, ahdg.group_name
mapper.select: SELECT ahd.item_code, ahd.item_name FROM assay_hosp_dict ahd join assay_hosp_dict_group_mapping ahdgm on ahd.item_code = ahdgm.fk_item_code and ahd.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id join assay_hosp_dict_group ahdg on ahdg.group_id = ahdgm.fk_group_id and ahdg.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id WHERE ahd.fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId} AND ahd.date_type = #{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ahdg.group_id is NOT NULL AND ahdg.group_name is NOT NULL order by ahd.item_name
mapper.update: update assay_hosp_dict set fk_dict_code = null where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select is_top, id,date_type, personal_min_value, personal_max_value from assay_hosp_dict where item_code = #{itemCode} AND fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId}

select ahdg.group_name,id,ahd.item_code,ahd.item_name,ahdg.group_id from assay_hosp_dict ahd join assay_hosp_dict_group_mapping ahdgm on ahd.item_code = ahdgm.fk_item_code and ahd.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id join assay_hosp_dict_group ahdg on ahdg.group_id = ahdgm.fk_group_id and ahdg.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id group by ahdg.group_name

select
from assay_hosp_dict ahd join assay_hosp_dict_group_mapping ahdgm on ahd.item_code = ahdgm.fk_item_code and ahd.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id join assay_hosp_dict_group ahdg on ahdg.group_id = ahdgm.fk_group_id and ahdg.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id where ahd.flage=1 group by ahdg.group_name ORDER BY ahdg.group_name

select
from assay_hosp_dict ahd join assay_hosp_dict_group_mapping ahdgm on ahd.item_code = ahdgm.fk_item_code and ahd.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id join assay_hosp_dict_group ahdg on ahdg.group_id = ahdgm.fk_group_id and ahdg.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id where ahd.flage=1 ORDER BY ahdg.group_name

SELECT dhl.group_id, dhl.group_name, max(IF(pac.id is null, 0, 1)) as selectFlag, 1 categoryFlag FROM (select
from assay_hosp_dict ahd join assay_hosp_dict_group_mapping ahdgm on ahd.item_code = ahdgm.fk_item_code and ahd.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id join assay_hosp_dict_group ahdg on ahdg.group_id = ahdgm.fk_group_id and ahdg.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id) ah LEFT JOIN patient_assay_class pac ON pac.item_code = ah.item_code and ah.fk_tenant_id = pac.fk_tenant_id
AND pac.assay_class = #{assayClass}
where ah.fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId} GROUP BY ah.group_id ORDER BY ah.group_name ASC

SELECT dhl.item_code, dhl.item_name, dhl.group_id, dhl.group_name, IF(pac.id is null, 0, 1) as selectFlag, 0 categoryFlag FROM (select
from assay_hosp_dict ahd join assay_hosp_dict_group_mapping ahdgm on ahd.item_code = ahdgm.fk_item_code and ahd.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id join assay_hosp_dict_group ahdg on ahdg.group_id = ahdgm.fk_group_id and ahdg.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id) ah LEFT JOIN patient_assay_class pac ON pac.item_code = ah.item_code and ah.fk_tenant_id = pac.fk_tenant_id
AND pac.assay_class = #{assayClass}
where ah.fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId} ORDER BY ah.group_name, ah.item_name

SELECT dhl.item_code, dhl.item_name, dhl.group_id, dhl.group_name,IF(agcd.item_code is null, 0, 1) as selectFlag FROM (select
from assay_hosp_dict ahd join assay_hosp_dict_group_mapping ahdgm on ahd.item_code = ahdgm.fk_item_code and ahd.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id join assay_hosp_dict_group ahdg on ahdg.group_id = ahdgm.fk_group_id and ahdg.fk_tenant_id = ahdgm.fk_tenant_id) ah LEFT JOIN assay_group_conf_detail agcd ON ah.item_code = agcd.item_code AND ah.fk_tenant_id=#{fkTenantId} AND ah.fk_tenant_id = agcd.fk_tenant_id AND agcd.fk_assay_group_conf_id = #{fkAssayGroupConfId} ORDER BY selectFlag desc, ah.group_name, ah.item_name
